verses.name: Ezekiel 15:1
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:2
verses.text: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:3
verses.text: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:4
verses.text: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?
